name: a camping adventure.
description:
Please play in full screen

During the second morning of your camping trip, you wake up to find all of your friends have disappeared from their tents. Team up with an out-of-control, annoying sword with a mind of its own to adventure into the forest searching for your friends.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 for the theme "Out Of Control"

The game can be downloaded here.

All of the controls are displayed within the game.

Enjoy!
